name: Maskplosion
description:
Maskplosion is game where two players compete with each other to gather masks and use their explosive powers to defeat their opponents.

The goal is to earn 20 points before your opponent. Grab exploding masks (red after collecting) and throw them at your enemies to make points. The blue masks have to be carried to your spawn point.

The game was made by three people during the IGJAM16 at the Gamescom within 48 hours.
